name: RainonLeaves
0:
”Alexa open Rain on Leaves”
”Alexa ask Rain on Leaves to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain on leaves
des:
Rain on Leaves captures the peaceful sound of raindrops gently falling on leafy canopies. This skill offers a refreshing and rejuvenating audio experience, ideal for creating a serene atmosphere conducive to relaxation, focus, or sleep.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Rain on Leaves
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
